name: Yukta!
greetingText: My god... you looking gorgeous today!
wishText: I love you with all my heart baby! You are my everything! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! You are amazing! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.

replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
